title: Part 2 - [NSFW] Pam & Tommy, Celeb Sex Tapes and The Evolution of Porn (Guest Starring Angelica Swiss)
itunes:title: Part 2 - [NSFW] Pam & Tommy, Celeb Sex Tapes and The Evolution of Porn (Guest Starring Angelica Swiss)
description:
Welcome back to part two of our conversation with Angelica Swiss (former dominatrix, former kink.com employee, and current cam model). We continue our conversation about Pamela Anderson, what's consent and how the legal system did her dirty. We deep dive into the culture around celebrity sex tapes (did Kris Jenner have anything to do with Kim Kardashian's sex tape?), how sex workers are using social media and new forums like Tik Tok to market themselves, and discuss in detail what it's like to be on set of a porn shoot!


Join us this week as we get to watch Aleena squirm while Angelica Swiss schools us on all things adult entertainment!


Don't forget to follow us, review our podcast and subscribe on our socials!

  • Twitter: @BasicandBrain
  • Instagram: @TheBasicandTheBrain
  • TikTok: @thebasic_and_thebrain
  • Website: thebasicandthebrain.com

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
